data.title: CMU Book Author Recognition | Clarke Historical Library
data.meta_description: Archived list of Central Michigan University faculty, staff, and emeriti who authored, co-authored, edited, illustrated, or translated books.
data.text:
2020 Honorees for Books Copyrighted in 2019

Bailey, Steven K., Author. Department of English Language and Literature. Bold Venture: The American Bombing of Japanese-Occupied Hong Kong, 1942-1945. Lincoln, NE: University of Nebraska Press, 2019.
